about_the_game:
This is an action RPG single player game.
[/h2]Real time combat [/h2]

3D action

First person attack and third person free switching

Game features:

1、the plot is intricate and touching, just like watching a movie.


Players can experience the twists and turns of the film and television plot, and make their own choices in the plot to achieve different game endings.

2、Treasure hunting and looting to obtain extraordinary abilities


In the early stages of the game, players can use their fists or pick up some common weapons (knives, bows, axes, harpoons) to attack enemies, and quickly obtain the key item "Magic Beans" in the game because it meets the plot conditions. This weapon can be thrown to the ground to generate a "Magic Tree", which can increase your health and defense.

Then players can obtain some magical or mysterious weapons by exploring, eliminating the owners of magical weapons, meeting hidden conditions, etc. These weapons have unique effects, such as the treasure gourd can absorb enemies, and the pagoda can cover enemies. There are also wings, magic ball, magic Circle, magic swords, headbands, super mysterious weapons, etc. Each weapon has unique effects, allowing players to obtain magical abilities, bring surprises to players, and help them pass levels smoothly.

Players can freely match and upgrade these weapons, and it is also a pleasure to pass levels with their unique weapon combinations. Different weapon combinations give players a different gaming experience every time they play the game.

3、 seaside leisure


Players can play football, swim, ride whales, surf, hunt, and enjoy leisure time by the seaside in the game.

4. Challenge Tournament


Players can participate in the fast clearance challenge in the game, and your results will appear on the fast clearance leaderboard with other players. Of course, the less time it takes, the higher the ranking, and the first place is waiting for you to win!


  • A magical adventure......









  • An unexpected relationship.....





  • An Impressive Journey of Mind.....
